name: Solar Defense (itch) (urbik)
description:
Action space shooter with upgradable ship and multiple levels. Provides challenging difficulty and about  1 hour of fun.

Game is controlled with mouse only. Goal of the game is to get highest score. Shoot as many asteroids as you can and collect every loot you can while taking least amount of damage.

Game assets:
